Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI provides a more general approach to problems unless all information has been explicitly provided to it. This is sometimes good or bad depending on how accurate I need the information to be. Getting teachers feedback is always better as it will always be accurate and catered towards the task at hand. A disadvantage is the response time, with AI you get an answer instantly but with getting a teachers response it can sometimes take a whole day or a few days.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Generally it feels better to get feedback from a teacher as the feedback is more personal rather than general and broad.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
AI response = more broad and less catered towards individual needs but faster response
Teacher response = more personal and catered towards the individual, response times may vary though.
